item.title: Half Life 1 on the iPhone?
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
I see what you did there.

I played the Half-Life PS2 version in an emulator on PC (pcsx2). I even set up the gamepad keyboard bindings so I could play it almost like the pc version (with mouse for look and WASD for movement). It was the bomb!

Also got the Dreamcast version of HL which I cant get to run in any of the emulators. It was a WinCE based DC game so it needs exact emulation (MMU).

I’m sure you can run HL on iPhone if you had the full source code and ported it. but running it via any emulation is not going to happen.

btw. I have purchased all Valve games so don’t give me any crap. Check my steam profile for proof.

item.title: Half Life 1 on the iPhone?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I just wanted to say that the system requirements are far from being met, the architecture is so vastly different! For example, an iPhone coupled with a decent x86 emulator could load windows 95 in around 30 minutes, and give you a PC capable of minesweeper and solitaire, not even doom 1 would be playable in that environment.
